faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know to get started
faq.1.q: How fast can I see results?
faq.1.a: Most clients see initial results within 7-14 days of campaign launch. Full optimization typically takes 30-60 days as we collect data and refine targeting.
faq.2.a: We support all major advertising platforms including Meta (Facebook/Instagram), Google Ads, TikTok, LinkedIn, Twitter, Taboola, Outbrain, plus SMS and email marketing.
faq.3.q: Do I need a large budget to start?
faq.3.a: No! We work with businesses of all sizes. We'll optimize your campaigns to maximize results regardless of budget, and you can scale as you see positive ROI.
faq.4.a: Simply click 'Get Your Proposal Now' to fill out a quick 2-minute questionnaire. We'll analyze your needs and provide a tailored proposal within 24 hours.
